data.message: I love all this and I will forever remain your Stan shady soldier till death your my only family in my heart and soul please listen to me Eminem , I want you back with the whole music witch you loved to rap and your music saved !y life I've said this before to you here in Facebook a million times probably you know me or not , but its my dream to see you live or meet you in a chat , I love you don't forget that , I want music from you like you did on your old ones Eminem show mmlp , I love you
